Mod1_Description: If an enemy is trapped by {c_important}Bone Prison{/c}, gain {c_number}{SF_3}{/c} Essence, plus an additional {c_number}{SF_6}{/c} per enemy trapped.
Mod3_Description: {c_important}{u}Fortify{/u}{/c} for {c_number}[{SF_7}*100|%|]{/c} Base Life {c_number}([Max(1,{fortified:MODB_FORTIFY})|0|]){/c} for each enemy trapped by {c_important}Bone Prison{/c}.
